Thanks for your interest in contributing.

New tools are added via **Pull Request only**.

Please open a PR here:
https://github.com/eudk/awesome-ai-tools/compare

Make sure to:
- Check for duplicates
- Add the tool in the correct category
- Follow the required format
- Keep the description short and neutral

Issues requesting new tool additions may be closed.
